participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ledsch_seda_d_baplusavgall.Description: baand rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (Geo Dist) ACS

ledsch_seda_d_gshi.Description: Highest Grade Offered in District (Geo Dist) Ed Facts -1 = pre-k; 0 = kindergarten

ledsch_seda_d_gslo.Description: Lowest Grade Offered in District (Geo Dist) CCD -1 = pre-k; 0 = kindergarten

ledsch_seda_d_hsecdnec.Description: Information index between schools:ECD/Non ECD (Geo Dist) CCD the information theory index is computed as the average deviation of each student's school racial diversity from the district-wide racial diversity. Values of 0 indicate no segregation while values of 1 indicate complete segregation. See Theil (1972) for more information

ledsch_seda_d_hsflnfl.Description: Information index between schools: Free Lunch/Non Free Lunch (Geo Dist) CCD the information theory index is computed as the average deviation of each student's school racial diversity from the district-wide racial diversity. Values of 0 indicate no segregation while values of 1 indicate complete segregation. See Theil (1972) for more information

ledsch_seda_d_lninc50avgall.Description: log of median income, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (Geo Dist) ACS

ledsch_seda_d_perasn.Description: percent asians in the district (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_perblk.Description: percent blacks in the district (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_perecd.Description: percent economically disadvantaged in the district (Geo Dist) Ed Facts

ledsch_seda_d_perell.Description: % of all Students in District that are ELL (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_perfl.Description: percent free lunch in the district (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_perfrl.Description: percent free or reduced lunch in the district (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_perhsp.Description: percent hispanics in the district (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_perind.Description: percent native americans in the district (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_perrl.Description: percent reduced lunch in the district (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_perspeced.Description: % of all Students in District that are Special Ed (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_perwht.Description: percent whites in the district (Geo Dist) CCD

ledsch_seda_d_povertyavgall.Description: poverty rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (Geo Dist) ACS

ledsch_seda_d_rsecdnec.Description: Relative Diversity index between schools:ECD/Non ECD (Geo Dist) CCD the relative diversity index captures ECD-non ECD differences in exposure to ECD students at the average ECD-non ECD student's school within the unit; for more information see Reardon and Firebaugh (2002)

ledsch_seda_d_rsflnfl.Description: Relative Diversity index between schools: Free Lunch/Non Free Lunch (Geo Dist) CCD the relative diversity index captures free lunch-not free lunch differences in exposure to free lunch students at the average free lunch/not free lunch student's school within the unit; for more information see Reardon and Firebaugh (2002)

ledsch_seda_d_sesavgall.Description: ses composite, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (Geo Dist) ACS see seda documentation for more detailed information on the construction of the SES measures from the ACS

ledsch_seda_d_singl_momavgall.Description: single mother HH rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (Geo Dist) ACS

ledsch_seda_d_snapavgall.Description: snap receipt rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (Geo Dist) ACS

ledsch_seda_d_unempavgall.Description: unemployment rate, eb estimate, all families, 2005-09 and 2014-18 avg (Geo Dist) ACS
